2c2a8193261b95f5.voiceContent: I'm a regular of Leschots', but whenever I pass by the other shops, I can't help but be curious...

67ddfa1eb9eab218.voiceContent: Until one day, greedy pirates stole a jewel-studded diadem from the underwater palace...

6c7a84a07af6258d.voiceContent: So, I decided to stick close and hug Pers, so we can keep each other warm...

9607b825ad0d6ad3.voiceContent: The seabirds flying overhead thought it would drown right then and there, but to their surprise, it began to swim like the swiftest of fish!

b15f9c158edc0d80.voiceContent: I mean, uh... Everything here is really nice. And I'm used to it now, so there's no need to worry about me.

d68ff4334a2c8426.voiceContent: May your dreams be as dazzling as the starry night above the ocean, and your dreamless nights be naught but filled with serene respite.

6f4815ebcc91ebcd.voiceContent: ...Alright, then in that case, I'll do as you ask...

ad68d6b892bf829e.voiceContent: I've always admired the Pers in the story, but after reading it, what struck me the most was... its loneliness.

0e54b5da77079edd.voiceContent: Heh... Are you really sure about that?

3bb811f5ceed5b11.voiceContent: So, if you could step in at that point, and help me...

6dd5c7bce80a2c28.voiceContent: Hmm... Could I trouble you to accompany me to a few places when you're free?

4e0797c21c5de436.voiceContent: This is nobody's problem but my own, so... Please don't think I'm upset with you, or unsatisfied about anything in this place.

e259b12fb7781a26.voiceContent: I'll pay you back, I swear! As long as it's something I can do...

a71979b8a070659f.voiceContent: Even though this place is really comfortable, and the environment here is flawless, I just... can't seem to get used to life here.

47d2f3e8613590ca.voiceContent: Ahh, thank you so much! I'm... not dreaming, am I?

07a3e4c0c152bc41.voiceContent: It swam and swam, until its strength finally gave out. It restored the diadem to its rightful place underwater, and immediately, the storms died down, and it was as if nothing bad had ever happened.

22ccb3f4f518f2a5.voiceContent: To explain it... I'll need to tell you a really, really old story I once read in a picture book.

1480862df09b20ca.voiceContent: The black-and-white bird tried to leap upwards, but it still couldn't fly... In its recklessness, it crashed against the mast and sank into the ocean alongside the wrecked ship.

d26908042e510b9f.voiceContent: Since birth, it spoke with a stutter, walked with a wobble, and was unable to fly, so it was always bullied by the other birds.

56a3b3aa9fd0c706.voiceContent: Mhm... I'd like to take a look at their clockwork crafts, as well as the variety of small mechanisms they usually have to offer.

3f19ceeab907e2a4.voiceContent: I'm... just going to stay here if you don't have any special assignments.

279b958178b821db.voiceContent: What I wouldn't give to be able to see everything for myself! If only... *sigh*

d86115a25c70f2ef.voiceContent: I'd like to visit Lepaute Horlogerie, Beaumont Workshop, and the Vasari Passage.

2eeae2178db06ac7.voiceContent: Yeah... Something like that. I know it's might be awkward, but...

a5a72389bbe89892.voiceContent: See, I'm... not very good at dealing with people, and if I spent a lot of time gawking at the wares without paying a single coin, I'm sure the shopkeepers would get mad at me.

2cf9baad3c1ecf51.voiceContent: I'm just worried that if I just say everything on my mind, I might cause unnecessary misunderstandings.

782df9fbffbdd2d4.voiceContent: ...Ah, thank you for remembering its name.

641713277418450f.voiceContent: Just a few words of explanation... should be enough.

ae920aca3d404840.voiceContent: As you've probably guessed by now... The bird in the story was named Pers. It was a penguin that came to town by accident.

a4cf453f8bb3dcc8.voiceContent: Eh!? No, no, of course not! That's not what I meant at all...

0063fbf4aaf5773c.voiceContent: To tell you the truth, I—I'm actually a little homesick.

e99b5416768acf99.voiceContent: In a flash, lightning and thunder engulfed the sea, and a tsunami rose from the depths, threatening to wipe out the entire town...

7957260daa3e8a36.voiceContent: Mhm... So once upon a time, in a faraway seaside town, there lived a black and white bird.

aa37479b694e1f64.voiceContent: What lies hidden deep within those shops? What if there's something there that's both original and exquisitely designed?

d0c1df8bb368ebef.voiceContent: This mechanism looks like it's been tampered with... Could he have done it?

663691a63f022528.voiceContent: Hmm, it's getting stuck on something. Seems like I'll have to avoid those obstacles while I turn it...

8e687ef7b838fd8e.voiceContent: If I really have to draw my blade, then...

ceecb7474162e1a4.voiceContent: If there's any scrap metal or parts you don't want, I'll take them.

4fb7052d53b00d1b.voiceContent: There's a lot of treasure here.

cdc3933596e237d2.voiceContent: Sort the items by type and store them for future use.

b30944a803d1948a.voiceContent: Well, I've got nowhere to go...

97fa84f8fc22606a.voiceContent: I want to spend some time at the bottom of the sea... In peace and total silence.

c5ed22ffef159fed.voiceContent: It's easy to fix a machine when you know how it's built and how it works. But people... they're much more difficult.

5a6f0908d05c545c.voiceContent: Wherever the tide takes me, so long as the light of the hearth still shines, I'll always have a home to return to...

b30c5fdac942082c.voiceContent: I always get so gloomy when it rains...

e232feb67fea13e9.voiceContent: The rain's stopped? Okay, that's good.

0a0a0ada28f59eaa.voiceContent: I'd rather be diving in the sea.

ef4b4d8bd2c8488f.voiceContent: Don't be scared, Pers. I'll keep you safe.

2e85263860715ad3.voiceContent: Maybe I should put on my diving helmet to... keep me warm...

23ddd13bf204cafe.voiceContent: Morning. Do you have an assignment for me today? If not, I'll head out.

398fe43dbd4168da.voiceContent: All the components look intact. Maybe it's just a worn-out spring? If so, that's an easy fix... Oh, sorry, I was... Did you say something?

5b9ed6bce0681384.voiceContent: Want a bowl of seafood soup? It's made with shrimp and shellfish caught earlier today. I'm no cook, but the ingredients are fresh, so... it shouldn't taste too bad.

c888b4994b0d6e4c.voiceContent: You go ahead, I'm gonna stay up and read for a while. Hmm? What am I reading? It's, um... it's about diving. There's a bunch of skills that I still need to... Anyway, night!

78aeeb4dd20001c3.voiceContent: As you know, diving is one of the few things I'm any good at. I spend more time among the Tidalga than I do talking to people. They don't ask you questions or act disappointed, they just float there quietly with you... The underwater world is much simpler than the world of dry land.

b3be7be3c856395d.voiceContent: Whenever I feel lonely at night, Pers is the one who's always there for me. I thought that maybe some other kids might want a toy for company too, so I made a bunch of clockwork penguins and took them to Leschots's workshop to put on sale... Apparently, the customer feedback was good, but they didn't sell too many of them. And most of the buyers were adults...

713d2425514fb82c.voiceContent: Tell me a bit more about yourself. Your hobbies, favorite food, favorite color, what animal you'd like to have as a pet... If you and I are companions, it means we're connected, more closely than gears in a machine.

43b3d4e782ba8221.voiceContent: Orders to me are like a clockwork spring driving me forward, and I don't know what to do with myself without them. So if there's anything you need me for, please don't hesitate to ask.

a9c747038139307b.voiceContent: After I got my Vision, I didn't need my helmet to go diving anymore. But... I can't bear to be without it. It cuts me off from the noise of the outside world, and makes me feel safe. My Vision, Pers, and my helmet... I draw my strength from them every time I take a breath.

cab761024a40081c.voiceContent: If you look up at the sky from far enough underwater, even the sun is soft on the eyes. That's why I like it down there.

f7fe62a4408c8776.voiceContent: I've seen lots of Beryl Conches down in the depths. The patterns are so intricate, I often lose track of the time just staring at them. These fossils are all that's left of these beautiful creatures... I wonder how long before the rest of the world becomes part of this underwater museum, too?

c22fffe3412c6c91.voiceContent: Father doesn't like it when children cry. Father says tears are the product of emotion and weakness. So when Father scolds me, I hold it in until I'm underwater, where no one can hear me cry. At least I have the Romaritime Flowers to keep me company.

90a131dc4b2823ee.voiceContent: When I was little, I was taught that we should be ready to give our lives for our family. But when Father took control, this philosophy changed. Father said that every one of us is important, and we have to value our own lives, be our strongest selves, and stand on our own two feet in this world... But actually, all of that's much harder than just following orders.

5cb65137f3d5409a.voiceContent: At home, Lyney's always showing me his magic tricks. Whenever I smile, he grins excitedly and says the audience is definitely going to love this one... Do I really smile so rarely?

883417faa23d5b32.voiceContent: Uh... I'm in no position to give a well-rounded opinion on the Hydro Archon, so... I'll pass. I mean, I've only seen her a few times... so I'm sure I have a somewhat skewed view of her.

b9f9f60198710215.voiceContent: ...Okay fine. I've seen what the Hydro Archon's like when she's sitting in the audience. In my view, she's a very charismatic speaker, but it's her silences that intrigue me more. Her eyes... they're like the darkness at the bottom of the ocean. Hiding a deep secret, afraid of anyone ever getting close to her... Ah! Sorry, I... I let my imagination get the better of me.

ea1fbcf73234f498.voiceContent: Lyney told me everything. I'm so grateful to you and Navia for your warmth and generosity. Please pass on my thanks when you see her... Huh? Tell her myself? ...Uh, I, uh... Ooh, I've suddenly got stomach cramps — sorry, gotta dash.

ba216f40251e2e9d.voiceContent: Lyney is our team leader, and acts like everyone's older brother... But I can tell that he puts on a brave face sometimes. I tried to talk to him about it once — told him that he doesn't need to wear a mask all the time. But he denied it, and we ended up having an argument... Since then, I've never brought it up with him again.

8e125e776423d8e6.voiceContent: If you assigned Lyney and Lynette with the same mission, they'd both do an outstanding job. But not me. Lynette is always comforting me, saying that everyone has their strengths, and how everyone relies on me to fix things around the house when they break down... If only I was half as good at anything else.

cfffc32a3782cedc.voiceContent: One day when I surfaced after a dive, the Chief Justice was just standing there alone on the beach. I don't know whether he had something on his mind, or was just enjoying the view... Obviously, I didn't ask. I only locked eyes with him for a split-second before disappearing back underwater. Thinking back, I must have looked so guilty... *sigh*

9acf48c09f17941e.voiceContent: I'm sorry, I can't really think of any good stories to share... the ones I do know will just bring down your mood.

f50a56c8cdaacdc1.voiceContent: My past... If you promise not to look at me, or you'll let me wear my diving helmet... Maybe then I could try to tell you a little more. Personality's one part of it, but... the bigger reason is that I've been avoiding my past for so long now, it might be hard to talk about...

9bf87cd2499859c0.voiceContent: I read in a book that when people die, they turn into stars and watch over us from the sky... I hate my real father. He abandoned my mother and me, so I don't care about him. But... if my mother looks down from the sky and sees that, after all this time in his new home, the child she protected with her life is still so timid that he can't fend for himself... Will she be... disappointed in me?

58b70a96dccc3913.voiceContent: I don't like thinking about my time in the House of the Hearth under the previous director. All I'll say is... My habit of retreating into the sea started back then. Father changed not only me, but my view of our family, too. Then Lyney and Lynette joined the family... and for the first time ever, I gained some genuine companions.

d3cad89f1d78790a.voiceContent: I once swore an oath that I would do whatever it takes to protect this family, and never look back. Now, I stay true to this oath not because it's the previous director's orders, or because it's what Father expects of me, but because it's my own desire. Please keep our family's secret safe... so that I can keep my promise.

23b926be265db25a.voiceContent: Apart from diving, my main hobby is dismantling mechanical things and modifying them. I also collect spare parts, and sometimes I build new clockwork toys out of them. ...Pers? No, Pers is more like family to me. We grew up together... No, I'm serious. I'm always tinkering with it to add more functionality... I truly hope that a day will come when Pers can fly free into the sky.

b462c536bff6ce7d.voiceContent: Seafood. Mainly fish and shrimp, crab's okay too. I'm really glad that Lyney and Lynette share my tastes, because it means we can eat meals together... I don't mind how the ingredients are cooked, though. I leave that decision up to them.

5ee6d2d8b26d459f.voiceContent: I can't handle coffee. More than half a cup and before long, my heart starts racing and I can't calm my breathing down. Everyone says that coffee can boost your energy levels, but to me, it's torture...

dadf0752ba47b34a.voiceContent: It's good. So good, I don't want to eat all of it in one go.

0134f5a639d23590.voiceContent: Is cooking one of your hobbies? It shows. I can taste how much care you put into these delicious meals.

1a324d03a1b2c604.voiceContent: Sorry... For a moment there I had the urge to run for my life. But that wouldn't be fair to you.

c19da4247ae073c9.voiceContent: Would you be willing to come with me somewhere? There's this place I know where the scenery is spectacular. I think it's even more magical than a fantasy novel. I have a secret hideout there, and I keep some glowing sea creatures as pets... I just want to give you a birthday experience like you've never had before, and then give you my birthday wishes... Will you give me the chance to do that?

48c12740a157d0c6.voiceContent: You didn't have to do this for me, you know. I'd obey you regardless.

cde4893860db24af.voiceContent: Your time and energy is a precious resource. Shouldn't you... spend it on someone else?

9c54bb316ad52824.voiceContent: How can I ever repay you for this? I don't know what to say, I... I don't have much practice at this, and right now I'm terrified of saying something stupid and upsetting you... and making you regret this whole thing... I'm sorry, is it okay if I just... say nothing, and just stay here with you for a while?

054a39586c98ea33.voiceContent: For some reason, Charlotte never believes me when I say I'm just an ordinary diver. She's convinced that my past is full of news stories waiting for her to dig up... Am I really that bad of a liar?

196a347c77a44d15.voiceContent: I owe Clorinde my life, but she says she doesn't want anything from me in return... It's not a nice feeling, having put someone out so much, and only being able to offer empty thank-yous in return.

26da9937247d4183.voiceContent: I hear that Chevreuse is a regular customer of Beaumont Workshop. She always purchases the most expensive and advanced components for her musket. If I make enough Mora, maybe one day I can afford to upgrade Pers's components.

64dc90ad09f5a3d9.voiceContent: Lumitoile attach themselves to many things. Sometimes on the reefs or docks, but most commonly on large underwater buildings. Do you think they're drawn to humans like Cicins are drawn to the light?

30258b8e92147edd.voiceContent: ...That's a tough question. I don't have any critical issues that need addressing, but at the same time, there's a long laundry list of minor things which all take their toll. If I was a clockwork toy on the shelf, I wouldn't even know where to start trying to fix me up... But at the end of the day, I guess it all comes down to one thing... I'm just too weak.

de06b9b0dcc7c708.voiceContent: Hello, my name's Freminet, I'm a diver... Oh, no need to shake hands. I mean, no need to be so formal. Ahem, if you need help surveying underwater ruins or salvaging materials, I can be of some use to you. But for anything else... You might find me a disappointment.

7d1cbe0132dbc50e.voiceContent: Is this... how you do it?
